subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
Immigration and Emigration
lead_paragraph: On college football’s signing day, Georgia Coach Mark Richt lost one top recruit because of an immigration issue. He gained another after visits to a church and a jail.
snippet: On college football’s signing day, Georgia Coach Mark Richt lost one top recruit because of an immigration issue. He gained another after visits to a church and a jail.
